Class CustomizeColorDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • eshmun.gui.kripke.dialogs.CustomizeColorDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class CustomizeColorDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    A Dialog that allows the user to pick the color for each process and actions.
    Author:
    kinan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getColors

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.awt.Color> getColors()
        Returns:
